meta.id: plus ca change, plus c'est la meme chose:f
stems: plus ca change, plus c'est la meme chose

hwi.hw: plus ça change, plus c'est la même chose

dt: {bc}the more that changes, the more it's the same thing {bc}the more things change, the more they stay the same

shortdef: the more that changes, the more it's the same thing : the more things change, the more they stay the same —often shortened to plus ça change
